lyric:
[00:22.180]There's gotta be another way out
[00:24.980]I've been stuck in a cage with my doubt
[00:27.730]I've tried forever getting out on my own.
[00:32.000]
[00:33.520]But every time I do this my way
[00:35.870]I get caught in the lies of the enemy
[00:38.640]I lay my troubles down I'm ready for you now.
[00:42.590]
[00:43.110]Bring me out
[00:44.690]Come and find me in the dark now
[00:46.920]Everyday by myself I'm breaking down
[00:50.120]I don't wanna fight alone anymore
[00:53.980]Bring me out
[00:55.650]From the prison of my own pride
[00:57.880]My God, I need a hope I can't deny
[01:00.620]In the end I'm realizing
[01:03.200]I was never meant to fight on my own
[01:06.210]
[01:11.290]Every little thing that I've known
[01:14.260]is every thing I need to let go
[01:16.860]You're so much bigger than the world I've made
[01:20.970]
[01:22.170]So I surrender my soul
[01:24.980]I'm reaching out for your hope
[01:27.760]I lay my weapons down
[01:29.960]I'm ready for you now.
[01:31.680]
[01:32.200]Bring me out
[01:33.930]Come and find me in the dark now
[01:36.080]Everyday by myself I'm breaking down
[01:39.240]I don't wanna fight alone anymore
[01:43.150]Bring me out
[01:44.710]From the prison of my own pride
[01:46.960]My God, I need a hope I can't deny
[01:49.750]In the end I'm realizing
[01:52.360]I was never meant to fight on my own
[01:55.200]
[02:05.930]I don't wanna be incomplete
[02:08.590]I remember what you said to me
[02:11.350]I don't have to fight alone
[02:14.470]
[02:15.730]Bring me out
[02:17.620]Come and find me in the dark now
[02:19.540]Everyday by myself I'm breaking down
[02:22.890]I don't wanna fight alone anymore
[02:26.650]Bring me out
[02:28.430]From the prison of my own pride
[02:30.590]My God, I need a hope I can't deny
[02:33.430]In the end I'm realizing
[02:35.900]I was never meant to fight on my own
[02:38.950]Oh oh, Oh oh, Oh oh, Oh oh
[02:44.400]Oh oh, Oh oh, Oh oh, Oh oh
[02:49.900]
tlyric:
[by:KRees]
[00:22.180]前方必定会有别的出路
[00:24.980]我受困在自身疑惧的牢笼
[00:27.730]尝试凭己之力永远逃脱此地
[00:33.520]但每次跟从自己的想法
[00:35.870]我都会深陷在敌人的谎言中
[00:38.640]如今放下一切困愁，为你准备就绪
[00:43.110]救我出去
[00:44.690]前往黑暗中将我寻找
[00:46.920]身单力薄的我每天渐渐崩溃
[00:50.120]我不想再如此孤军奋战
[00:53.980]救我脱离
[00:55.650]带我离开骄纵筑起的监狱
[00:57.880]吾主，我无法抵挡对希冀的渴望
[01:00.620]最后我才意识到
[01:03.200]我从未想过独自担下战斗
[01:11.290]我所知道的每一件小事
[01:14.260]是我需要远离世俗
[01:16.860]你比我创下的内心世界更要强大
[01:22.170]因此我舍下灵魂
[01:24.980]为你的希望伸出双手
[01:27.760]放下武器
[01:29.960]现在正听候你
[01:32.200]救我出去
[01:33.930]前往黑暗中将我寻找
[01:36.080]身单力薄的我每天渐渐崩溃
[01:39.240]我不想再如此孤军奋战
[01:43.150]救我出去
[01:44.710]带我离开骄纵筑起的监狱
[01:46.960]吾主，我无法抵挡对希冀的渴望
[01:49.750]最后我才意识到
[01:52.360]我从未想过独自担下战斗
[02:05.930]我不想再变得残缺凋零
[02:08.590]仍记得你对我说过的话
[02:11.350]我不必再孤军奋战
[02:15.730]救我出去
[02:17.620]前往黑暗中将我寻找
[02:19.540]身单力薄的我每天渐渐崩溃
[02:22.890]我不想再如此孤军奋战
[02:26.650]救我出去
[02:28.430]带我离开骄纵筑起的监狱
[02:30.590]吾主，我无法抵挡对希冀的渴望
[02:33.430]最后我才意识到
[02:35.900]我从未想过独自担下战斗
[02:38.950]
[02:44.400]
